scripts.postinstall1: pnpm run download-hrea-obs && pnpm run download-hrea-specification && pnpm run download-hrea-agent && pnpm run download-hrea-planning && pnpm run download-hrea-proposal && pnpm run download-hrea-plan && pnpm run download-hrea-agreement && pnpm run download-facets
scripts.dev: VITE_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) VITE_APP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(port) BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 npm run x
scripts.x: hc s clean &&  npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run start:happ" "hc run-local-services -b $BOOTSTRAP_PORT -s $SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.tool-devy: WASM_LOG=debug RUST_LOG='debug,wasmer_compiler_cranelift=error,holochain::core::workflow=error,holochain::conductor::entry_def_store=error' RUST_BACKTRACE=1 GRAPHQL_DEBUG=1 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "sleep 1 && we-dev-cli --agent-idx 1 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts" "sleep 10 && we-dev-cli --agent-idx 2 --dev-config we_dev/config.ts"
scripts.tool-devx: BPORT=46263 SPORT=46262; concurrently "hc run-local-services -b $BPORT -s $SPORT" "npm start -w ui" "./we_dev/we.AppImage  --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 1 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT" "sleep 10 && ./we_dev/we.AppImage --dev-config we_dev/config.json --agent-num 2 -b http://127.0.0.1:$BPORT -s ws://127.0.0.1:$SPORT"
scripts.network: hc s clean && pnpm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "cd ui && pnpm start" "pnpm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: pnpm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir && cd tests && pnpm t
scripts.launch:happ: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/acfn.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.launch:normal: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/acfn.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network mem
scripts.start:happ: echo "starting with admin $VITE_ADMIN_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT --piped generate workdir/acfn.happ --run=$VITE_APP_PORT -a acfn network -b "http://127.0.0.1:$BOOTSTRAP_PORT"  webrtc "ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_PORT"
scripts.package: rm -f ui/dist.zip && pnpm run build:happ && pushd ui && pnpm run package && popd && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.package2: pnpm run build:happ && pnpm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: pnpm run build:zomes && hc dna pack dnas/migration/workdir && hc app pack workdir
scripts.clean:hrea-modules: rimraf workdir/hrea_observation.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_specification.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_agent.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_planning.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_proposal.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_plan.dna; rimraf workdir/hrea_agreement.dna
scripts.clean:modules: rimraf node_modules; for DIR in $(find -type d -iname node_modules); do echo "  Remove $DIR"; rm -Rf "$DIR"; done
scripts.clean:build: rimraf target; rm dnas/acfn/workdir/acfn.dna; rm workdir/acfn.happ
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:build; pnpm run clean:build-cache; pnpm run clean:hrea-modules; pnpm run clean:modules
